Title: S 7 Ep. 308 Strategic Innovation and the Future of Healthcare: A Conversation with Enrico Marcellino
Description:
In this insightful episode of The Intern Whisperer Podcast, Isabella chats with Enrico Marcellino, a seasoned leader in the healthcare and innovation sectors.

Enrico shares his multifaceted career journey, from his creative beginnings in film to his pivotal roles with Advent Health. Enrico is a key leader in process improvement and internal communications. His passion for strategic decision-making, creative problem solving, and empathy shines through as he discusses his personal growth and the influences that have shaped his leadership style.

Enrico delves into his belief in servant leadership, with Isabella sharing more about this leadership model from the teachings of Robert K. Greenleaf, a thought leader in Servant Leadership. He also highlights the importance of empathy, crediting his wife (shout out to her) for helping him grow into a more compassionate leader.

 

The conversation then shifts to the future, where Enrico explores the evolving landscape of healthcare and technology, particularly the role of AI, augmented reality, and virtual reality. He shares his vision of the healthcare industry in 2030, with a focus on improving patient experiences and empowering healthcare professionals. As the world accelerates toward a more tech-centric future, Enrico is optimistic about the potential of generative AI to revolutionize industries, but he also raises concerns about the ethical implications of these innovations. From discussing the future of work to offering mentoring advice, this episode is packed with valuable insights for anyone looking to understand the intersection of innovation, healthcare, and leadership.

We hope you enjoy this week's episode of The Intern Whisperer. The Intern Whisperer Podcast is brought to you by Employers 4 Change - Increasing #Skills #DiversityEquityInclusion #recruitment and #management for #interns and #employees alike.
